EditTextPreference.android:title: Period (minutes)
EditTextPreference.android:summary: Period between measurements. Minimum of 1 minute.

EditTextPreference.android:title: Target size
EditTextPreference.app:summary: The size (edge length) of the square target in metres

EditTextPreference.android:title: Initial distance
EditTextPreference.android:summary: The initial distance (at calibration) between the phone and the target in metres

EditTextPreference.android:title: Manual focal length value
EditTextPreference.android:summary: Value for focal length generated at calibration. You shouldn't need to adjust this

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Warp Camera
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Change this if the camera view is warped

ListPreference.android:title: Select Camera
ListPreference.android:summary: Select the camera device to use

EditTextPreference.android:title: Flash brightness threshold
EditTextPreference.android:summary: Maximum brightness value (0-100) where the flash is turned on to aid in target finding

SeekBarPreference.android:title: Gaussian blur size
SeekBarPreference.android:summary: Higher values blur more when looking for target edges, odd numbers only

EditTextPreference.android:title: Canny first threshold
EditTextPreference.android:summary: First threshold used in the Canny find edges algorithm. Recommended value 35.0

EditTextPreference.android:title: Canny second threshold
EditTextPreference.android:summary: Second threshold used in the Canny find edges algorithm. Recommended value 125.0

EditTextPreference.android:title: Curve approximation epsilon
EditTextPreference.android:summary: Accuracy of Douglasâ€“Peucker algorithm used to approximate a contour's curve. Values closer to 0 are more exact. Recommended value 0.1

EditTextPreference.android:title: Minimum number of edges for target
EditTextPreference.android:summary: Minimum number of edges a target can have to be considered a rectangle. Recommended value 4

EditTextPreference.android:title: Maximum number of edges for target
EditTextPreference.android:summary: Maximum number of edges a target can have to be considered a rectangle. Recommended value 6

EditTextPreference.android:title: Minimum target aspect ratio
EditTextPreference.android:summary: Minimum acceptable target aspect ratio (width divided by height). Recommended value 0.8

EditTextPreference.android:title: Maximum target aspect ratio
EditTextPreference.android:summary: Maximum acceptable target aspect ratio (width divided by height). Recommended value 1.2

EditTextPreference.android:title: Minimum perceived target size
EditTextPreference.android:summary: The smallest acceptable perceived size (edge length) of the target in pixels. Recommended value 24

EditTextPreference.android:title: Minimum target solidity
EditTextPreference.android:summary: The smallest acceptable value for solidity of the target (target area divided by convex hull area). Recommended value 0.9
